title: In the Shadow of the Caravans

sources.title: In the Shadow of the Caravans
sources.description: This documentary explores life in Afghanistan, months ahead of the Soviet invasion in 1979. Licensed by Cinecontact.

metadata.Plot: About Afghanistan before the Soviet invasion in Dec.1979 begun. Border unrest, trade routes blocked and the Afghan mujahideen is about to take up arms against the intruder. In April 1978, the communist People's Democratic Party of Afghanistan (PDPA) seized power in a bloody coup d'Ã©tat against then-President Mohammed Daoud Khan, in what is called the Saur Revolution. The PDPA declared the establishment of the Democratic Republic of Afghanistan, with its first leader named as People's Democratic Party general secretary Nur Muhammad Taraki.
metadata.Actors: Abdullah Yusuf Azzam, Whab Madadi, Nur Muhammed Taraki
